system.novice: Navigator makes Opposed Willpower Test vs all living beings looking into their Warp eye (Navigator tests once, all others compare to it). Targets that fail take 1d10 + Navigator's Willpower Bonus damage Energy damage + 1d10 per Degree of Success. Ignores non-warded armour, but Toughness works as normal. Non-living, Untouchable, or Daemonic/Warp targets are immune. Forewarned/Unaware targets have +30 on Roll to resist.
system.adept: Damage increases to 1d10 + 2x Navigators Willpower Bonus in Energy Damage, + 1d10 per Degree of Success. Can also damage non-living beings and inanimate objects. Navigator suffers 1 Fatigue and Wound, or 2 wounds if failing WP Test by 1+ DoF.
system.master: Targets get no bonus to Opposed test from looking away. However Navigator suffers 1d5 wounds (ignores armour+toughness) and can't use any other powers for rest of encounter. If failing WP Test by 1+ DoF, take 1d10 Fatigue.
